channel.title: If...then or something of the sort
channel.description:
i have 7 messages, if message 1-4 is filled out and not 5-7 i want the script to run only the procedures that have 1-4 in them. how would i get it to run 1-4 and not 5-7 or maybe 1-2 or 1-6 etc. etc. (and i only want the ones filled out to run once using all the filled out messages...
my procedures are "s1,s2,s3,s4,v1,v2,v3" message 1...s1 goes with this one message 2...s2 goes with this one message 3...s3 goes with this one message 4...s4 goes with this one message 5...v1 goes with this one message 6...v2 goes with this one message 7...v3 goes with this one
i want the script to check if message 1 is filled out...if so then i want it to run s1 if message 2 is filled out then i want s1 and s2 to run if message 3 is filled out then i want s1 and s2 and s3 to run ETC.
and i dont want it to rerun s1 if message 1 and 2 are filled out ETC.

item.title: If...then or something of the sort
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

…ill post the script…its for my computer…but im lazy…its for lime wire and if i only want to search 1 thing…then i will only fill out message1 and i dont want it to search for the other stuffs…

Read full topic

item.title: If...then or something of the sort
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

for i := 1 to 7 do if not message[i] = '' then s[i]

That may help you? This means that it will loop through that peice of code under for…to…do until i =7.

Read full topic
item.source: If...then or something of the sort

item.title: If...then or something of the sort
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Ok, I dont realy understand. What do you mean if there filled out? Are they set up as const’s or variables?

Well heres this, I dont know if this will help you.
[scar]If (s1= ??) then
Begin
//blah blah
End Else
//procedure you want here if s1 does NOT = ?? , understand?[/scar]

OR, if you want more like you were saying just add And’s

[scar]If (s1= ??) And (s2= ??) And (s3= ??) And (s4= ??)then
Begin
//blah blah
End Else
//procedures you want here…[/scar]

Its hard to help you when I dont realy understand what you are asking.

Read full topic
item.source: If...then or something of the sort

item.title: If...then or something of the sort
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

i have 7 messages, if message 1-4 is filled out and not 5-7 i want the script to run only the procedures that have 1-4 in them. how would i get it to run 1-4 and not 5-7 or maybe 1-2 or 1-6 etc. etc. (and i only want the ones filled out to run once using all the filled out messages…

my procedures are “s1,s2,s3,s4,v1,v2,v3”
message 1…s1 goes with this one
message 2…s2 goes with this one
message 3…s3 goes with this one
message 4…s4 goes with this one
message 5…v1 goes with this one
message 6…v2 goes with this one
message 7…v3 goes with this one

i want the script to check if message 1 is filled out…if so then i want it to run s1
if message 2 is filled out then i want s1 and s2 to run
if message 3 is filled out then i want s1 and s2 and s3 to run ETC.

and i dont want it to rerun s1 if message 1 and 2 are filled out ETC.
